description: Kanba goes to visit his ex-girlfriend Asami in hospital, but for some reason she has absolutely no memory of ever meeting him. At the same time, Shoma is doing everything he can to be able to borrow Ringo`s diary - which means he is helping her move out of her room.

titles.title: La "M" che lega te e me
M de Tsunagaru Watashi to Anata
Mでつながる私とあなた
Nous sommes reliés par "M", toi et moi
You & I Are Connected by M
